title: Not a issue: but a request for how getting help
body:
Hi

Sorry to bother the MSBuild team, but I did not found on internet a MSBuild mailing list or an instant messaging channel for helping the users of MSBuild. May be I am wrong, but how can I get help on MSBuild?

TIA

nodes.body:
There's not currently a formal public forum for this sort of discussion. A [Gitter channel](https://gitter.im/Microsoft/msbuild) exists but it's not monitored by the core team.

Of course you're welcome to use public fora like [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/msbuild).

If you think you've found a bug in MSBuild itself, please file a bug here! Requests for additional [documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/msbuild) are also valid here (or through the feedback mechanism on the docs site).
